sense.def:
One's partner
je oseba, s katero je človek poročen ali s katero ima spolne odnose.

seg.quote: A marriage is likely to last if you and your partner are similar in personality.

sense.def:
Pri igri ali plesu je
one's partner
oseba, s katero nekdo igra ali pleše.

V poslovnem svetu so
the partners
ljudje, ki so skupni lastniki podjetja.

seg.quote: She was a partner in a firm of solicitors.
